content: finishing using c4 and c5 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c4 weave in all ends except c27 block to finished dimensions using c5 and c6 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c5 return held sts to ndl remove provisional co place recovered sts onto spare ndl using c6 and c7 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c6 for a standard cowl graft the ends together using c27 and kitchener stitch using c7 and c8 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c7 for a twisted cowl lay the cowl flat then flip one narrow edge 180 degrees before grafting the ends using c8 and c9 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart together using c27 and kitchener stitch the placement cut c8 of the stitches on the needles may need to be adjusted using c9 and c10 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart before grafting cut c9 using c10 and c11 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid chart cut c10 water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat using c11 and c12 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c11 using c12 and c13 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c12 using c13 and c14 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c13 chart key chart using c14 and c15 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c14 color a 5 using c15 and c16 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of 4 chart cut c15 color b 3 using c16 and c17 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of 2 chart cut c16 repeat 1 using c17 and c18 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c17 using c18 and c19 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of 4-st repeat chart cut c18 using c19 and c20 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c19 using c20 and c21 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c20 using c21 and c22 as colors a and b work
